wiki.summary: “Chrome Heart Tags” (originally titled “Chrome Hearts Tags”) is Lil Uzi Vert’s first released collaboration with Chief Keef. Although anticipated snippets like “Bean” and “Mooliani” were teased before the release of Eternal Atake, “Chrome Hearts Tag” features no vocals and only production by Chief Keef. On the track, Uzi laments the loss of a girl and spends money to cope. The chorus shouts out Virgil Abloh, founder of fashion label Off-White and current Creative Director of Louis Vuitton. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Chrome Heart Tags” (originally titled “Chrome Hearts Tags”) is Lil Uzi Vert’s first released collaboration with Chief Keef. Although anticipated snippets like “Bean” and “Mooliani” were teased before the release of Eternal Atake, “Chrome Hearts Tag” features no vocals and only production by Chief Keef. On the track, Uzi laments the loss of a girl and spends money to cope. The chorus shouts out Virgil Abloh, founder of fashion label Off-White and current Creative Director of Louis Vuitton. He most notably designed the cover for Uzi’s 2017 release Luv Is Rage 2. The instrumental was first used by Chief Keef himself for his unreleased track “Skkrt Skkrt Skkrt Skkrt Skkrt.” Read more on Last.fm.
